page.title: 15Police in Soham
page.content: In Soham there are{eight constables and{one Sergeant.}Two policeman are resident constables and the rest are section officers.The residents look after Soham while the section officers drive Panda cars throughout the area. Resident officers patrol around the town to prevent offences and to get to know the local people.The section officers go out in their Panda cars and deal with any messages put through to them such as traffic accidents or offences, crimes, fires or other emergencies. The most common offence in this area is vandalism followed by theft, but in recent years there has been less anti- social behaviour.Relationships between the police and the public are usually good, but the police are always glad of any assistance in preventing crime.
